locations.name: The Buka Restaurant
locations.description: It is a very popular place in the city and the vibes are just everything. It is very family-friendly and warm with great customer service. Buka serves authentic African dishes.

locations.name: Ayewamu by Jane
locations.description: Aside from the great food, this restaurant wins my heart just by the way they present their food in a traditional authentic Ghanaian Asanka bowl (earthenware bowl).

locations.name: Chop Shop
locations.description: The restaurant has a cute eating setup with a beautiful interior design and walls decorated with portraits of renowned people from across the world.

locations.name: Bantama Avenue
locations.description: From the food to the service and the traditional stool setting, you get a unique food experience here.

locations.name: Azmera Restaurant
locations.description: Azmera Restaurant is renowned for its authentic Ghanaian cuisine, offering a delightful and immersive dining experience.
locations.location: Sir. Arku Korsah Rd, Roman Ridge- Accra

locations.name: Country Kitchen
locations.description: When you walk in, you will notice how the restaurant's decor combines rustic elements with Ghanaian art and artifacts, creating a cozy and homely setting.

locations.name: Mango’s Bar and Grill
locations.description: Their fufu and soup is definitely one to try so I will mention it again. They have an outdoor space which is airy and comfortable.
locations.location: Nii Sai Rd, East Legon- Accra

locations.name: Baobab Traditional Restaurant
locations.description: This is a great spot for local food dining, positioning itself as one of the best spots to eat Fufu. Their Fufu and light soup option is a bestseller.

locations.name: Asanka Avenue
locations.description: This restaurant offers a simple outdoor dining area and serves some of the best “eto” (this is a plantain dish) you’ll ever eat.

locations.name: Aseda Kitchen
locations.description: The food is really great! The food is served in traditional bowls which makes the presentation of the food attractive.

locations.name: Chez Amis Bar and Grill
locations.description: This restaurant offers a simple outdoor dining area and serves some of the best “eto” (this is a plantain dish) you’ll ever eat.
